name: Dave England
text: After suffering with OK pizza for years in the Valley I finally found the perfect pizza for me. Deep Dish Works Pizza from Howie's is absolutely awesome.

name: Nvpcfix Computer Repair
text: Always awesome pizza. Try it, you would not be disappointed.

name: luven u
text: This is the  ONLY place I go for pizza!! I have yet to have a negative experience.  The food is delicious,  service is phenomenal,  and you just cant go wrong with this place. I would reccomend joining the rewards program because you will ‚Ä¶More

name: Lance Olson
text: This is a good pizza place, I'd totally go back. The asian chicken pizza knocked my socks off. The flavored crusts weren't as tasty as I thought they'd be, but the pizzas were still delicious. Better than Little Caesars for sure.

name: The Joneses : Try to Keep Up
text: Had my first visit today 12/19/19 . The pizza was ok. Tried their BBQ boneless wings.. it was very bready. I might try the traditional wings. A little pricy, not sure if they have promos like other chains.

name: Houda Hamzeh
text: Everything taste great everything üëçüèª

name: lashay cherry
text: great food! on time, fresh as heck still hot!

name: Kevin Bothum
text: Good pizza for the price. The crust drizzle separates them from the other chains.

name: Brandy
text: I am definitely not a pizza lover until I went to hungry howies and now I will eat pizza and they are not very expensive at all delicious fast really good food

name: Beckie Gobber
text: Always great pizzaand salad

name: Brett M Wyman
text: ... No better place to get your pizza than here! Words can not even describe how good their pizza and crust is.

name: ttna77

name: Rob Lopez
text: Love their pizza! Great pizza for a great price. You've gota try the pizza with asiago crust. Delicious!!

name: Calmer than You are
text: Jacob and Bree made our experience and pizza amazing! I will come back! Thanks guys!

name: Justin Spurrier
text: Friendly and helpful staff. Lol @ the hip tip jug.

name: Edgar Ives
text: Excellent pizza. Im sure Ill be back. Crust really stands out on this pizza. Its slightly thick but with a fried bread kind of texture as Im pretty sure its cooked with butter. You may want to pass on this pizza if your looking for healthy, light, low fat, zero carb gluten free pizza???

name: Daniel
text: Far exceeded my expectations. A great and delicious pizza. The crust is superb and I love the complete control of the sauce request on the pizza. I'm an extra sauce kind of guy and I will order 2x sauce and 2x crust flavoring next time. The ‚Ä¶More

name: Colton Stawarz
text: Order once for delivery. Pizza was good. Driver got lost. Took him an over an hour because he used Google maps instead of the directions I gave them. Called in today for delivery and they said I was out of their delivery range. They said max delivery is 3.5 miles. I'm 3.4 even tried to get the manager to do it they still said no.

name: samir vasani
text: Excellent pizza love the flavored crust.

name: Olivia Banks
text: Excellent pizza and very good crust!

name: Shannon Young
text: Ordered for pickup.  Order was ready when promised when I arrived and extremely hot and fresh from the feeling when my hands held the boxes.  We went with the two med 12" pizza with a Howie bread (garlic cheese bread) for $15. ‚Ä¶More

name: Cesar Palacios
text: Pizza never arrived... ordered 8:30ish and waiter past 10pm and it never arrived

name: Alexia Purciful
text: Local owned. Great food. My family loves this place. It's our go to for every Pop up gathering we have. Crazy good! The cheesy bread is slamming

name: Richard G
text: Good pizza and terrific service!

name: Maurice Jackson
text: Great pizza better price

name: Matt Stover
text: So much awesome cheese

name: Dawid Machala
text: Very cheap meal, but unfortunately the quality was rather low. The crust is among the worst I've tired. The topping has been ok, though. And the waiter has been very kind. ‚Ä¶More

name: Blair Canfield
text: Order from them once a week. I have never had a problem with them or their service. Delivery guys are always great and super nice. The pizza is really good too, way better than every other delivery place.

name: Chris Auxer
text: We've ordered from Hungry Howie's a few times now, and every time has been fantastic. The service is prompt, the pizza is hot and fresh, and the price is just right ($7 w/ tax for 1 large 2 topping pizza). While other pizza places are good, Hungry Howie's is on a whole new level.

name: Angela Lizada
text: This was my favorite pizza place in Florida and I was excited there is one out here. I love the flavored crusts, calzones, and their chef salad. They are always pretty quick and friendly.

name: scott keeton
text: Good pizza for the price.

name: Holly Linger
text: Great pizza & excellent customer service. Amy was super nice and understanding

name: Sandra
text: Love the pizza with the flavored crust!! My favorite is the sesame seed.

name: Jody Jayo Harris
text: Great pizza, fantastic selection, and trying the different crust flavors is a must. I love this place!

name: donal moore
text: Hungry Howie's pizza is good fair-priced a lot of cheese on there and toppings well worth the value

name: liz zie
text: Family's been coming here for about 3 years now, service and quality of their pizza is always top notch.

name: Brian Zabo
text: Ordered online and used a coupon for a free item but was overcharged because the coupon did not take off the whole price of the item. When I mentioned it to the staff in the store, they didn't seem to know how to help. I emailed support ‚Ä¶More

name: victoria k.
text: You get what you pay for if you pick up. Cheap pizza but kids manage the place. Good learning experience from them but add 10-15 min to your order time.

name: Briana Robinson
text: Ive eaten at the chain in the past but this last visit to this location was disappointing. Pizza was fine but the wings were not cooked thoroughly.

name: Mike Papa
text: Use to order the two medium pizza deal everyother week as a cheat meal for me and my wife. We loved the cajun crust, now the cajun seasoning has completely changed. Its all salt!!! Thought it was a fluke, so we ordered it again, same thing. ALL SALT.....  Am I the only one that thinks this?

name: Kenny Pham
text: tried to use 1 of their coupons and they said "coupon is misleading" and they "were just joking when we made the coupon". they are fn jokes. all good I'll see the Mgr around since he wants to be a smart ass to my wife. I'm going to be happy to put you in your place punk!

name: Mark Garland
text: We always enjoy pizza with a flavored crust

name: Laura White
text: Gorgeous pizza, at a decent price

text: Hungry Howie's pizza was so awful it was still doughy on the inside and it gave my sister food poisoning I would never recommend eating at this establishment
